Class OAuthController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.master.keymanagementserver.kms.controllers.OAuthController

  • @Controller
public class OAuthController
extends java.lang.Object
    provide functions for working with the oAuthModel

    • Method Detail

      • createOAuthTokenForUser

        OAuthModel createOAuthTokenForUser(UserModel userModel,
                                   java.lang.String tokenType)
        create a new token for the provided user with the provided tokentype
        Parameters:
        userModel - the userModel which has to get a token
        tokenType - the type of the token (actual just access)
        Returns:
        the created OAuthModel, null if error occurred

      • getOAuthTokenByTokenId

        public OAuthModel getOAuthTokenByTokenId(java.lang.String oAuthTokenId)
        get the token with the provided tokenid
        Parameters:
        oAuthTokenId - tokenId that is searched
        Returns:
        OAuthModel with the provided tokenId, null if error occurred

      • getOAuthToken

        public OAuthModel getOAuthToken(UserModel userModel)
        get OAuth Token for userModel get existing or create new one
        Parameters:
        userModel - the userModel which has to get a token
        Returns:
        the OAuthModel which was created or found, null if error occured

      • searchOAuthModel

        OAuthModel searchOAuthModel(UserModel userModel)
        search the token belonging to the provided userModel
        Parameters:
        userModel - userModel which token should be returned
        Returns:
        the found token for userModel, null error occurred

      • deleteOldTokens

        public boolean deleteOldTokens(java.util.Date now)
        delete old tokens stored in the database tokens just have limited valid range
        Parameters:
        now - the Date, everything with notValidAfter before this will be deleted
        Returns:
        true
